prompt: Develop a user settings page with vibrant purple theme (#7B1FA2) on white background. Position profile section at top with centered circular avatar (90x90 pixels) above user name 'Jane Smith' and email in purple-bordered card with shadow. Use grid layout for three setting categories: Account (Edit Profile, Change Password, Privacy), Preferences (Notifications toggle, Dark Mode toggle, Language dropdown), Support (Help, Contact, About). Each grid tile has purple icon, text, and interactive elements. Apply Material 3 design with 10px rounded corners, full-width purple logout button, 16px padding and 8px grid spacing.
